name: test_minting_with_invalid_collaterals[plutus_v2]
description:
Test minting a token with a Plutus script with invalid collaterals.

        Expect failure.

        * fund the token issuer and create an UTxO for collateral with insufficient funds
        * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
        * mint the token using a Plutus script
        * check that the minting failed because no valid collateral was provided
descriptionHtml:
Test minting a token with a Plutus script with invalid collaterals.

    Expect failure.

    * fund the token issuer and create an UTxO for collateral with insufficient funds
    * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
    * mint the token using a Plutus script
    * check that the minting failed because no valid collateral was provided
statusMessage: Skipped: runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model
statusTrace: ('/home/martink/Source/repos/cardano-node-tests7/cardano_node_tests/tests/test_plutus_mint_raw.py', 1588, 'Skipped: runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model')
